an4.20:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhattuddesako yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.20:1.3: Chandagatim gacchati, dosagatim gacchati, mohagatim gacchati, bhayagatim gacchati—
an4.20:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato bhattuddesako yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.20:2.1: Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhattuddesako yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an4.20:2.3: Na chandagatim gacchati, na dosagatim gacchati, na mohagatim gacchati, na bhayagatim gacchati—
an4.20:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato bhattuddesako yathabhatam nikkhitto evam saggeti.
an4.20:3.3: Chanda dosa moha ca bhaya gamino,
an4.20:4.3: Dhamme thita ye na karonti papakam,
an4.20:4.4: Na chanda na dosa na moha na bhaya ca gamino;
